definitions.definition: To make (someone or something) neat ; to arrange (people or things) in an orderly , tidy way; to tidy .
examples: She made a frantic attempt to neaten her hair.

definitions.definition: To engage in activity that arranges someone or something in an orderly, tidy way.
examples: Don't mind me if I neaten while you talk.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To make (someone or something) neat ; to arrange (people or things) in an orderly , tidy way; to tidy .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To engage in activity that arranges someone or something in an orderly, tidy way.
